# HotChocolate v15 Documentation Index

Complete URL map for self-learning. Use `fetch_webpage` to retrieve any page before implementing its patterns.

## Base URLs

```
Docs:    https://chillicream.com/docs/hotchocolate/v15
GitHub:  https://github.com/ChilliCream/graphql-platform
Source:  https://github.com/ChilliCream/graphql-platform/tree/main/src/HotChocolate
```

## GitHub Source Code Locations

For source-level investigations, these are the key modules:

| Module | Path |
|---|---|
| Core (types, schema, execution) | `src/HotChocolate/Core` |
| ASP.NET Core integration | `src/HotChocolate/AspNetCore` |
| Data (filtering, sorting, projections) | `src/HotChocolate/Data` |
| MongoDB integration | `src/HotChocolate/MongoDb` |
| Spatial | `src/HotChocolate/Spatial` |
| Cost Analysis | `src/HotChocolate/CostAnalysis` |
| Caching | `src/HotChocolate/Caching` |
| Persisted Operations | `src/HotChocolate/PersistedOperations` |
| Diagnostics | `src/HotChocolate/Diagnostics` |
| Language (parser, AST) | `src/HotChocolate/Language` |
| ApolloFederation | `src/HotChocolate/ApolloFederation` |
| Fusion (next-gen gateway) | `src/HotChocolate/Fusion-vnext` |
| OpenApi | `src/HotChocolate/OpenApi` |
| Mutable schema | `src/HotChocolate/Mutable` |
| GreenDonut (DataLoader) | `src/GreenDonut` |

## Keyword → Topic Mapping

Quick lookup when a user mentions specific APIs:

| Keyword / API | Topic to Fetch |
|---|---|
| `[UsePaging]`, `Connection<T>`, cursor, offset, keyset | Pagination |
| `[UseFiltering]`, `IFilterConvention`, `FilterConvention` | Filtering |
| `[UseSorting]`, `ISortConvention`, `SortConvention` | Sorting |
| `[UseProjection]`, `IProjectionConvention` | Projections |
| `BatchDataLoader`, `GroupedDataLoader`, `CacheDataLoader`, GreenDonut | DataLoader |
| `[Authorize]`, `AuthorizeDirective`, `@authorize` | Authorization |
| `IErrorFilter`, `ErrorBuilder`, `IError` | Mutations (error handling section) |
| `[Error<T>]`, `[UseMutationConvention]`, `MutationConventionOptions` | Mutations |
| `[Subscribe]`, `[Topic]`, `ITopicEventSender`, `ITopicEventReceiver` | Subscriptions |
| `IHttpRequestInterceptor`, `ISocketSessionInterceptor` | Interceptors |
| `ScalarType<T>`, custom scalar | Scalars |
| `[Node]`, `[ID]`, `INodeResolver`, Global Object Identification | Relay |
| `[OneOf]` | Input Object Types |
| `[Module]`, `AddTypes()`, source generator | Defining a Schema (auto registration) |
| `DirectiveType<T>`, `[Directive]` | Directives |
| `ITypeModule`, runtime schema building | Dynamic Schemas |
| Persisted queries, APQ, `UseAutomaticPersistedOperationPipeline` | Persisted Operations |
| `[Cost]`, query complexity, depth limit | Cost Analysis (→ GitHub source) |
| `IExecutionDiagnosticEvents`, `AddInstrumentation` | Instrumentation |
| `SetGlobalState`, `GetGlobalState`, `ContextData` | Global State |
| `AllowIntrospection` | Introspection |
| `IFile`, `Upload` | Files |
